mapper.insert: insert into factory_equipment (equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_position, equpment_install_date, equpment_repair_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equpmentInstallDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{equpmentRepairDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update factory_equipment set equipment_name = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_position = #{equipmentPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equpment_install_date = #{equpmentInstallDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, equpment_repair_date = #{equpmentRepairDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_position, equpment_install_date, equpment_repair_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from factory_equipment where equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_position, equpment_install_date, equpment_repair_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from factory_equipment
